name: Capsule Lock
description:
In this brain teasing puzzle game, test the limits of your knowledge. Think outside of the box to solve puzzles. Embark on a slightly different adventure, and roam trough all the seasons. Are you able to solve all puzzles ?  

This project was presented as the final project for conclusion of educational program "INKUBATOR - PISMO"  for "Unity/C# game developer" and is yet to be finished by a new start-up game development company called Bandrax Entertaiment.

CONTROLLS:  Swipe walls to open path for capsule to reach the goal. Press SWAP button to change controls between Capsule and Walls. Move Capsule by dragging it with finger in the direction you want it to go.

Game Designer/ Level designer - Dejan Šakić

Main Programer - Dražen Krijan

UI Designer - Filip Oršulić

Mentor - Dominik Cvetkovski

Special thanks - Mario Čelan, SIMORA
